title: He dies! the friend of sinners dies!

verses.text: He dies! the friend of sinners dies! Lo! Salem's daughters weep around; A solemn darkness veils the skies, A sudden trembling shakes the ground.
Come, saints, and shed your tears anew, Behold the great Redeemer weep; nor let He shed his precious blood for you, Then let us your tears before him.
Here's love and grief beyond degree, The Lord of glory dies for men; But lo! what sudden joys we see, Jesus the dead revives again!
He lives forever, wondrous King, Born to redeem, and strong to save; Then ask, O death, where is thy sting? And where thy victory, boasting grave?
